text: (nampikkaiyāḷarkaḷē! Uṅkaḷ maṉam) cāntiyaṭaintavarkaḷāka, ciṟiyatoru nittirai uṅkaḷai cūḻntu koḷḷumpaṭi (iṟaivaṉ) ceytatai niṉaittup pāruṅkaḷ! Aṉṟi (atu camayam) uṅkaḷ tēkattai nīṅkaḷ cuttappaṭuttik koḷvataṟkākavum, uṅkaḷai viṭṭu ṣaittāṉuṭaiya acuttattaip pōkki viṭuvataṟkākavum, uṅkaḷ uḷḷaṅkaḷai palappaṭutti, uṅkaḷ pātaṅkaḷai uṟutippaṭuttuvataṟkākavum (avaṉē) vāṉattiliruntu maḻaiyai poḻiyac ceytāṉ
